<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rte_eb_concat_operation"><sys_rte_eb_concat_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><conditional_fields>dcaf5b8b077d7950b965f7208c1ed0c0</conditional_fields><conditional_script><![CDATA[/* Example Script

    for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
        
        // step1: access the input variables
        var a = batch[i].input;

        // step2: your script code goes here

(function(batch, output) {
    // add your code here
	    for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
        
        // step1: access the input variables
        var a = batch[i].input;

        // step2: your script code goes here
        var b = a + " (Now)";

        // setp3: set the output for each element
        output[i] = b;
    }
    
})(batch, output);]]></conditional_script><is_conditional>false</is_conditional><joining_string>|</joining_string><name>Set Edge Label</name><operation_group/><order>100</order><source_sys_rte_eb_field/><source_sys_rte_eb_fields>061551b507aa2910b965f7208c1ed069,dcaf5b8b077d7950b965f7208c1ed0c0</source_sys_rte_eb_fields><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_concat_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>adminanil</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-15 17:45:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>a5b3ad5707f1f950b965f7208c1ed0bd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Edge Label</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AwesomeNowCreativeWorks" source="x_146833_creativ_0">2bb0627a0782ed90b965f7208c1ed07a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="Generate GarphML Data">5ea151bd076a2910b965f7208c1ed0c9</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="Staging">ef33117107aa2910b965f7208c1ed052</sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_scope display_value="AwesomeNowCreativeWorks">2bb0627a0782ed90b965f7208c1ed07a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_concat_operation_a5b3ad5707f1f950b965f7208c1ed0bd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>adminanil</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-15 17:45:41</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="edgeLabel">5904255707f1f950b965f7208c1ed012</target_sys_rte_eb_field><target_sys_rte_eb_fields/><type display_value="Concatenation">4e38102a73b333002b6265a751ab9e1f</type></sys_rte_eb_concat_operation></record_update>
